text: Alberto Augusto Antunes Festa (21 July 1939 â€“ 2 January 2024) was a Portuguese footballer. He played as a right-back. He played for the Portugal national football team, making 19 appearances between 1963 to 1966. Festa died on 2 January 2024 in Lisbon, Portugal from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease, aged 84. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease
title: Alberto Festa
